articles.title: Scientists Confirm the Human Species Is the Result of a Fusion Between Two Ancestral Populations - The Daily Galaxy
articles.description: Homo sapiens may not have emerged from a single lineage, but rather through an ancient genetic fusion. This new research uncovers surprising connections that reshape our understanding of human ancestry.

articles.description: My family and I have been T-Mobile customers for the last 10 years. But after the latest price increase, I'm calling it quits.
